metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45857 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue discovered in Axios 1.5.1 inadvertently reveals the confidential XSRF-TOKEN stored in cookies by including it in the HTTP header X-XSRF-TOKEN for every request made to any host allowing attackers to view sensitive information.

criterions.comment: node-axios package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
